resources.string: Add a delay to NFC presence check to accommodate longer NFC smart card operations in the AOSP NfcNci implementation on certain devices (see LineageOS issue #7268)
Running on Android %1$s (SDK level %2$d)\nXposed API (version %3$d) provided by %4$s
Set the NFC presence check timeout (in milliseconds) according to your needs
Allowed values are any whole number from 125 up to 5000
